news.title: Exclusive poll: Support dips for Taoiseach and Tanaiste amid forecasts of bleak Budget
news.summary: Government parties have taken a hit in the polls after a week of arguing over whether student fees should be cut in the next Budget.

news.title: ‘To be absolutely clear’ – Joe Duffy rules himself out of presidential race after at least two parties show interest
news.summary: Former RTÉ Liveline host Joe Duffy has officially confirmed he will not seek a nomination for the presidency.
